mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user( username, password, nickname, phone, email, avatar, status, remark, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{status}, #{remark}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE username = #{username} AND is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
